basic.origin: China, Former Soviet Union, Central Asia, Siberia, Mongolia, Japan, North America

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Ikes warm moist environments, like sunshine and resistant to shade
maintenance.fertilization: Apply plenty base fertilizer, apply little in the seedling stage, top-dressing chemical fertilizers in peak growth stages if needed
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and diseased branches timely
